Story Introduction

It is early Friday morning as Mr. Lee walks down the street. He isn't bothered by the noisy cars or masses of people racing to work during rush hour. As he enters the Historic downtown section, the traffic dies down. Soon Mr. Lee approaches the front of a small shop.

Mr. Lee has been running a small jewelry business out of this shop for over fifty years. Since his wife had passed away, it was the only thing that kept him going. Every morning he would walk to work and open up his jewelry shop.

Mr. Lee's hand-crafted jewelry attracted the attention of many shoppers. He offered a wide variety of designs to meet anyone's needs. If only the customer's realized that the jewelry possessed special powers.
